location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 3 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, General Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a circular (No 2427 of 1824), which proclaimed that native servants are prohibited from retaining in their possession papers belonging to the public offices.
